MallMonthlyCard.monthlyCard.small.2:
[Everbright Wishes: Stardust Details]

1. Purchase to immediately receive 600 Stellanite Lumina and activate a 30-day duration.

2. While active, logging in each day grants 150 Stellanite Dust and 1 Bottled Vigor Soda.

3. If your remaining duration is 180 days or less, purchasing again will extend the time cumulatively.

4. The maximum duration is 210 days. If you already have more than 180 days left, you cannot purchase again.

5. Missed daily rewards will not be compensated.
MallMonthlyCard.monthlyCard.strength.2:
[Everbright Wishes: Ascent Details]

1. Purchase to immediately receive 300 Stellanite Lumina and activate a 30-day duration.

2. While active, logging in each day grants 5 Canned Vigor Soda and 2 Monolith Stairs Pass.

3. If your remaining duration is 180 days or less, purchasing again will extend the time cumulatively.

4. The maximum duration is 210 days. If you already have more than 180 days left, you cannot purchase again.

5. Missed daily rewards will not be compensated.
